articles.author: Sammy Westfall, Leo Sands
articles.title: Southern Europeans protest overtourism with water pistols - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hundreds of demonstrators marched through Barcelona, Lisbon, Venice and other European cities over the weekend, protesting the negative effects of overtourism.
articles.content:
As the summer tourist season comes into swing, hundreds of locals, some holding water guns, gathered in major destinations in Spain, Italy and Portugal on Sunday to protest overtourism.

articles.title: Proba-3’s first artificial solar eclipse - European Space Agency
articles.description: Today, the European Space Agency’s Proba-3 mission unveils its first images of the Sun’s outer atmosphere – the solar corona. The mission’s two satellites, able to fly as a single spacecraft thanks to a suite of onboard positioning technologies, have succeede…
